titles.title: King of kings and Lord of lords

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
King of kings, and Lord of lords,
Glory, hallelujah! (2x)
Jesus, Prince of Peace,
Glory, hallelujah! (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
King of kings and Lord of lords (Jesus, Prince of Peace)
Glory hallelujah
King of kings and Lord of lords (Jesus, Prince of Peace)
Glory hallelujah
King of kings and Lord of lords (Jesus, Prince of Peace)
Glory hallelujah
King of kings and Lord of lords (Jesus, Prince of Peace)
Glory hallelujah
